mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lte_vcharge_charge_event ( event_id, event_type, event_date, event_process, vcharge_engagement_number, operator_id, user_id, item_code, fee ) VALUES ( seq_lte_volume_charge_charge_e.NEXTVAL, BINARY_TO_EUC(#{eventType.dbValue}), #{eventDate}, BINARY_TO_EUC(#{eventProcess}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{volumeChargeEngagementNumber.value}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{operatorId.value}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{userId.value}), BINARY_TO_EUC(#{volumeChargeItemCode.value}), #{volumeChargeFee.value} )
